archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Receive Port Over Request
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The Receive Port Over Request process is responsible for receiving notifications of number portability between third CSPs.

properties.value: The Receive Port Over Request process is responsible for receiving notifications of number portability between third CSPs. The process allows notify other systems or applications about number portability processes between third CSPs for different.
